item.title: ğŸˆ CutieCat
item.description: Overview # CutieCat is a modular cat-shaped console that supports Adafruit QT-Py & Seeed Studio Xiao style microcontrollers. These tiny but powerful MCU’s support WiFi, Bluetooth, Native USB, and all the other fun hacking features we love, in a minimal footprint. CutieCats ship with the Xiao ESP32-S3 but you can easily swap in your own microcontroller! Features # Previous Next At a Glance # ğŸ”‹ Battery Level + Charging ğŸ“¡ WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS ğŸ’¾ MicroSD Storage ğŸ•¹ï¸ Modular Expansion ğŸš¦ RGB LED Components # Name Part Description CutieCat PCB Custom Circuit Board design Comes with all SMD components pre-soldered for user ease.

item.title: âš¡ MiniMeter
item.description: ğŸ›ˆ Skip ahead to the mods if you're just looking to install your MiniMeter! Overview # MiniMeter is a compact LiPo Charger & Battery Meter. The minimal footprint can be dropped into any existing design or easily powers microcontrollers! Every DevKitty design is compatible with MiniMeter. Features # ğŸ”‹ Measure Battery Level âš¡ LiPo Charging âš¡ Toggle Charging Speed âš¡ Constant 3.3V Output (LDO) Usage # On the CutieCat, its as simple as soldering MiniMeter into place!

item.title: Case Designs
item.description: â„¹ï¸ Tolerances on 3D printed cases may be imperfect. We try our best to improve the design with each new batch we ship. Links # ğŸ“ PCB Dimensions ğŸ“ Case Files Features # DevKitty ships with a basic 3D-printed enclosure that protects the screen & other components from damage in transit. The design is comprised of 4 parts: Faceplate Backplate D-Pad Bumper The design snap fits together with 3 bevels and 2 relief points.
